a very fun and challenging classic fps while its gameplay is generally fastpaced both the hitscan enemies and the level design require you to stop and analyze the situation for a moment before blasting everything including yourself to bits theres also a wide variety of weapons at your disposal which keeps the flow of the levels fresh and engaging i recommend using voidsw for a better experience on modern pcs especially if you want to be able to use steam overlay
